defaultMedicines.name: Aspirin 81 mg
defaultMedicines.note: Use for minor aches and pains.  Drink a full glass of water with each dose.  Take 4 to 8 tablets every four hours for ages 12 and up.  Do not take more than 48 tablets within 24 hours.

defaultMedicines.name: Aspirin 325 mg
defaultMedicines.note: Use for minor aches and pains.  Drink a full glass of water with each dose.  Take 1 or 2 tablets every four hours for ages 12 and up.  Do not take more than 12 tablets within 24 hours.

defaultMedicines.name: Cyclobenzaprine 10 mg
defaultMedicines.note: Use for treating pain and stiffness caused by muscle spasms.  For ages 15 and up, take it three times a day until treated.

defaultMedicines.note: Use for treating seizures and pain caused by shingles.
